channel.title: This was Toscanini
channel.description:
A documentary honoring the 100th anniversary of the birth of conductor Arturo Toscanini, hosted by Brigette Paolucci.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Part one
item.description: This program presents the first part of a documentary that pays tribute to conductor Arturo Toscanini.
item.dc:creator: Paolucci, Bridget
item.dc:subject: Toscanini, Arturo, 1867-1957--Friends and associates

item.title: Part two
item.description: This program presents the second part of a documentary that pays tribute to conductor Arturo Toscanini.
item.dc:creator: Paolucci, Bridget
item.dc:subject: Toscanini, Arturo, 1867-1957--Friends and associates
